DOC.detailed_description: In randomize control crossover design , participant receive 2 daily meal without onion powder 2 week . Between two 2-week period 4-week wash-out period . One week intervention period , participant instruct avoid consumption onion , garlic foodstuff contain bioactive component ( polyphenols , sulfur-molecules ) onion . This include number vegetable fruit , condiment , tea , chocolate , red wine etc . Fasting blood sample draw ( 2 separate day ) intervention period , also weight blood pressure measure . Participants collect 24-hour urine feces sample twice completion intervention period . After fast blood sample first blood sample day period , participant receive test meal ( 10 g onion powder placebo , i.e . 8.5 g sucrose+ 2 g soy protein isolate ) . The acute effect study blood sample urine sample 0 , 2 , 4 24 hour test meal .
